section.title: Draco Build System Reference Manual.
section.para: The Draco Build System components reside within the draco/coding directory.

section.title: Configure Macros
section.para: The configure macros are definded in the draco/config directory. Certain files contain "public" macros that are used in the package configure.ac files. Other files contain "private" macros that are internal to the DBS. The public macros are difined in the follwoing files:

listitem.para: ac_dracoarg.m4: defines the configure-options in the DBS
ac_dracotests.m4: defines the configure-time tests of the environment
ac_draco_vendor.m4: defines macros to set-up the DBS to use Draco as a vendor
ac_conf.m4: defines macros that can be used to specify install and test options in package configure.ac scripts
ac_local.m4: defines macros used internally by the DBS
ac_platforms.m4: defines platform-specific environment settings used internally by the DBS
